Sentencas: Electrophoretic deposition, thermal co-evaporation and RF magnetron sputtering methods are used for the preparation of Mn-Co based ceramic coatings for solid oxide fuel cell steel interconnects.
Titulo: Microstructural and electrical characterization of Mn-Co spinel protective coatings for solid oxide cell interconnects

Sentencas: Both thin and relatively thick coatings (1-151.1m) are prepared and characterised for their potential protective behaviour.
Titulo: Microstructural and electrical characterization of Mn-Co spinel protective coatings for solid oxide cell interconnects

Sentencas: Mn-Co coated Crofer22APU samples are electrically tested for 5000 h at 800 degrees C under a 500 mA cm(-2) current load to determine their Area Specific Resistance increase due to a growing chromia scale.
Titulo: Microstructural and electrical characterization of Mn-Co spinel protective coatings for solid oxide cell interconnects

Sentencas: After tests, samples are analysed by scanning and transmission electron microscopy.
Titulo: Microstructural and electrical characterization of Mn-Co spinel protective coatings for solid oxide cell interconnects

Sentencas: Analysis is focused on the potential chromium diffusion to or through the coating, the oxide scale thickness and possible reactions at the interfaces.
Titulo: Microstructural and electrical characterization of Mn-Co spinel protective coatings for solid oxide cell interconnects

Sentencas: The relationships between the coating type, thickness and effectiveness are reviewed and discussed.
Titulo: Microstructural and electrical characterization of Mn-Co spinel protective coatings for solid oxide cell interconnects

Sentencas: Out of the three Mn-Co coatings compared in this study, the one deposited by electrophoretic deposition presents the best protection against Cr diffusion and offers long term stability.
Titulo: Microstructural and electrical characterization of Mn-Co spinel protective coatings for solid oxide cell interconnects
